JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Skilled Mechanics and Technicians for Passenger Cars and Vans - Aabenraa, Denmark
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We are looking for mechanics and technicians to join our modern autoworkshop in Aabenraa! We are a workshop with facilities for both van- and passenger cars as well as a damage center. As an IVECO dealer, we specialize in IVECO vehicles but repair all brands of both passenger cars and vans.

If you are passionate about cars and technology, and you want to work with the latest tools and methods in a company that sets the standard for quality and innovation, this opportunity is for you.

We are offering:
• State-of-the-art facilities: Our workshop is equipped with 37 lifts and the newest technology.

• Dynamic and forward-thinking work environment: Be part of a company that adapts to industry changes and strives for continuous improvement.

• Development opportunities: Access to a variety of training courses to enhance your skills and career.

• Teamwork and great colleagues: Work with around 35 colleagues, including 8 apprentices, in a supportive and positive atmosphere.

• Competitive salary and benefits: Enjoy an attractive salary package based on your qualifications and experience, pension scheme, and health insurance. Regulated by a collective agreement with Dansk Metal.

Your daily tasks:
• Handle small and large repairs for passenger cars and vans across various brands.

• Conduct mechanical and electrical diagnostics and repairs.

• Develop and expand your technical skills through varied tasks and challenges.

• Collaborate with a close-knit team where knowledge sharing and cooperation are key.

Your qualifications:
• Trained mechanic or technician with a passion for your trade and a desire to embrace new challenges.

• Experience with different car brands is a plus but not a requirement.

• Strong skills in diagnosing mechanical and electrical components (especially for technicians).

• Willingness to learn and grow in a fast-paced environment.

• Ability to work both independently and as part of a team.

Practical information:
• Start date: As soon as possible.

• Type of contract: Permanent employment.

• Working hours: Full-time (37 hours per week).

• Location: Aabenraa, Denmark

• Salary: Competitive and based on qualifications and experience. The hourly wage for a mechanic with a few years of experience ranges between 185-200 DKK. Depending on whether you have prior technician experience or education, the rate may be slightly higher. The hourly wage for overtime is 75 DKK.

Additionally, there is a 10% pension contribution and 12.5% holiday allowance. We are part of a collective agreement with Dansk Metal.

Contact Person: Lars Hansen, Owner, Lars@hltservice.com, +45 40265431

How to apply:
Send your application to lars@hltservice.com. Please write "Mechanic/Technician Application - Aabenraa" in the subject line.

Join us and become part of a company that leads in a constantly evolving industry. We look forward to hearing from you!
